welcome_message_body: Welcome to Osmaniye, a charming city known for its historical sites, beautiful nature, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Osmaniye has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Ciğerci Enver Usta
restaurants.description: Ciğerci Enver Usta is a chinese restaurant located in Osmaniye.

restaurants.description: Enver Usta is a steakhouse located in Osmaniye.
